sentence.Network_en: He managed to lighten the generally lifeless debate at times.
sentence.Network_cn: 他让这场总体很沉闷的辩论时不时迸出了些火花。

sentence.Network_en: An efficient bulb may lighten the load of power stations.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个节能灯泡也许就能减轻发电站的负荷。

sentence.Network_en: In sharing this secret you lighten your burden.
sentence.Network_cn: 和别人分享这个秘密可以减轻自己的负担。

entry.def: When something lightens or when you lighten it, it becomes less dark in colour.

example.ex: Leslie lightens her hair and has now had it cut into a short, feathered style.
example.tran: 莱斯莉将头发染成了浅色，现在又剪了个短蓬头。

entry.def: If someone lightens a situation, they make it less serious or less boring.

example.ex: Anthony  felt the need to lighten the atmosphere...
example.tran: 安东尼觉得有必要缓和一下气氛。

example.ex: He managed to lighten the generally lifeless debate at times...
example.tran: 他让这场总体很沉闷的辩论时不时迸出了些火花。

entry.tran: （使）（态度、心情等）变得轻松（或愉快）
entry.def: If your attitude or mood lightens, or if someone or something lightens it, they make you feel more cheerful, happy, and relaxed.

example.ex: As they approached the outskirts of the city, Ella's  mood visibly lightened...
example.tran: 他们快到市郊时，埃拉的情绪明显好转。

example.ex: The sun was streaming in through the window, yet it did nothing to lighten his mood.
example.tran: 阳光透过窗户照进来，可是这也不能让他的心情开朗起来。

entry.def: If you lighten something, you make it less heavy.

example.ex: It is a good idea to blend it in a food processor as this lightens the mixture...
example.tran: 把它放到食品加工器里搅拌是个好主意，因为这样能够使混合物的分量减轻。

example.ex: He pulled the lightened sled with all his strength.
example.tran: 他用尽全力拉减轻了重量的雪橇。

entry.def: If someone or something lightens your burden or your load, they make a bad or difficult situation better for you.

example.ex: The minister has persuaded the banks to lighten the burden of the foreign debt...
example.tran: 部长已经说服银行减轻外债负担。

example.ex: In sharing this secret you lighten your burden...
example.tran: 和别人分享这个秘密可以减轻自己的负担。

auth_sentence.content: Things lighten up later with a huge evening concert.
auth_sentence.res_content: Things lighten up later with a huge evening concert.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Things lighten up later with a huge evening concert.

auth_sentence.content: Lighten your load with two conferences in one.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lighten your load with two conferences in one.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Lighten your load with two conferences in one.

auth_sentence.content: The mixture should lighten and increase in volume.
auth_sentence.res_content: The mixture should lighten and increase in volume.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The mixture should lighten and increase in volume.

sentences.en: The sky began to lighten after the storm.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨后天空开始放晴。

means.word_mean: 别那么严肃；别抱怨；别担忧

sentences.en: Come on, lighten up! It was only a joke.
sentences.cn: 喂，别紧张！这只不过是开玩笑。

sentences.en: He did his best to lighten things up.
sentences.cn: 他尽力使局势生动起来。

sentences.en: She tried to lighten up her speech with a few jokes.
sentences.cn: 她讲了几个笑话以使讲话轻松愉快些。
